name: Verify fields displayed after clicking Apply button for "LinkedIn Profile:" -- @1.6

steps.name: Given I am on the Career landing page
When I click on the dropdown and select "Hardware Department"
And I wait for the job listings to load
Then I click the Apply button for the "Brake designer" job
Then I should see a new page for filling job application details
And I should see "LinkedIn Profile:" displayed

fullName: Verify fields displayed after clicking the Apply button for Brake designer: Verify fields displayed after clicking Apply button for "LinkedIn Profile:"

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Verify fields displayed after clicking the Apply button for Brake designer
